segments.text: Yes . I've dreamed a thousand times that I could lie down here to relax .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We are tired of jobs and competition . We need a quiet place .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd like to stay here for all my life if possible .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So would I . Look , it might be going to rain .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't think it will spoil our trip .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It will give us better feeling and atmosphere if it rains .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let's kick off our shoes to walk on the green flag stoned roads .
segments.speaker: S2
